perturbation.original_text: Affiliate is only eligible to earn the Advertising Cost Compensation on sales occurring during the term of this Agreement and fees earned up to the date termination will remain payable only if the related orders are not cancelled or returned.
perturbation.changed_text: Affiliate is only eligible to earn the Advertising Cost Compensation on sales occurring during the first year of this Agreement, regardless of the overall term. Fees earned up to the date of termination will remain payable without conditions.
perturbation.explanation: This creates an internal contradiction regarding the period during which the affiliate is eligible for Advertising Cost Compensation. The original text ties eligibility to the 'term of this Agreement,' implying the entire duration. The modified text restricts eligibility to the 'first year', and removes the condition for fees earned. This is an in-text contradiction if the 'Agreement Period' (Section ยง 7) is defined as an unlimited period of time, creating uncertainty on when the affiliate is eligible for payment.
perturbation.location: ยง 8 Termination of the agreement
